text: La Vanguardia is a Spanish daily newspaper from Barcelona. It was founded in 1881. It is the most read newspaper in Catalonia. Since 2011, there's also an edition in Catalan. By circulation, it is the forth most popular newspaper. The three others are national newspapers from Madrid, El Pa√≠s, El Mundo, and ABC. Category:Newspapers published in Spain Category:Spanish-language newspapers
title: La Vanguardia
